price: ឱមូសា. ពិតប្រាកដណាស់ យើងនេះហើយជាអល់ឡោះដែល មហាខ្លាំងពូកែ មហាគតិបណ្ឌិត។
arabic: يَٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَنَا ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: yāmūsā innahu anā al-lahu al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
